This is an Early Access Demo

The Metanthropes System is in active development and expected to be out of Early Access later in 2024

Gain Early Access to our Premium Modules & support us in unlocking stretch goals for more maps and original artwork for our first Kickstarter that is live until March 12th, 2024!

Import Adventure to begin

Click on the following link and select the 'Import Adventure' button

@UUID[Compendium.metanthropes.demo.Adventure.0vnV6XmnYtvtZ81c]{Early Access Demo}

The Demo comes with 4 Metanthrope Protagonist Actors, each with a different example build, to showcase a small glimpse of the 500+ unique abilities that come with the Core Module.

Showcase

Some features to try out in this Early Access Demo:

  • Responsive Character Sheet: Resize your Character Sheet and have it alter the amount of information displayed based on the available window width. Use the header buttons for some pre-configured layouts.

  • Informational Tooltips: The majority of the UI has informational tooltips that will explain and showcase available options when you mouse over

  • Roll Stats: Click on the Stats Page of your Character Sheet and click on any of the Stat Scores to roll that Stat, taking into account all Buffs, Conditions and Effects applied to your results. Right Click to Customize the Roll circumstances.

  • Re-Roll with Destiny: Click on the 'Spend Destiny to Reroll' button on the Chat to automatically deduct a Destiny Point and reroll the last roll, keeping all previous Bonuses and Penalties.

  • Activate Metapowers: From the Metapowers Page of your Character Sheet, click (or right-click) on the Metapower Icon to roll and then click on the 'Activate Metapower' button on the Chat to roll the effects for that Metapower. Click on the Name of that Metapower instead, to see more information in a separate sheet.

Coming Soonâ„¢

These features are currently in development and will be part of the Metanthropes System later in 2024

  • Accumulating Levels of Success: Metapowers & Possessions will increase the impact of the activated effects, based on the total Accumulated Levels of Success

  • Spending Levels of Success: Following a successful activation, you will be able to spend your Accumulated Levels of Success to drastically increase the impact of your Metapowers

  • Automated Damage, Healing & Active Effects: Activating Metapowers and using Possessions will apply the damage or healing automatically to the selected targets and also apply or remove Buffs, Conditions and Active Effects as required.

  • Use of Measured Templates: Leverage Foundry's Measured Templates feature to help with auto-targeting within the area of effect of a Metapower or Possession.

  • Automated Audio & Visual Effects: Activating Metapowers and using Possessions will trigger Visual & Audio effects

  • Official 3rd Party Module Support: We will be officially supporting the best 3rd Party Modules from the amazing community of Foundry Developers

  • Leverage v12 Features: Leverage the upcoming features of Foundry VTT v12 such as Scene Regions for the activation of certain Metapower effects

To disable this Welcome Screen, please disable the setting from the Game Settings -> Configure Settings -> Metanthropes Early Access options

Metanthropes is a brand new d100-based, setting-flexible game system with classless leveling where players develop Metapowers which empower them with unique, metaphysical gifts that transform them into something extraordinary.

As part of our first Kickstarter campaign, we are offering Early Access to three groundbreaking modules for Foundry VTT: the Introductory, Core, and Homebrew Premium Content Modules.

The Introductory Module includes an amazing new map, 20 pre-made Actors, 10 Metapowers covering levels 1-3, 5 pre-made Possessions, 2 pre-made Scenes, Journals, Rollable tables, and Narrator toolkit macros.

Additional original artwork & battle-map will be unlocked for the Introductory Module, if we reach our stretch goals by March 12th!

The Core Module bumps up support for 500+ unique abilities with 100 Metapowers covering levels 1-5 and 50 pre-made Possessions

The Homebrew Module adds enhanced support for creating your homebrew content and customizing system rules.

Back us on Kickstarter until the 12th of March 2024, take advantage of the lowest prices we'll ever offer and gain Early Access for all 3 Premium Foundry Modules and gain access to more content on metanthropes.com
